4efdb047-ba82-4674-9de4-4ae301a0a20d.description: The earner demonstrates the knowledge and skill to successfully implement effective and high quality training for their operation. All C.P.T. individuals are empowered to train and certify frontline workers using the CMI Custodial Technician Handbooks or CMI Verified Training materials.
4efdb047-ba82-4674-9de4-4ae301a0a20d.name: ISSA CMI Certified Professional Trainer, C.P.T.

issuer.summary: issued by The Worldwide Cleaning Industry Association

badge_template_activities.title: Attendance of a CMI Train the Trainer workshop, Virtual or in person.
Pass the examination with a minimum score of 80%

skills.name: Effective Time Management And Classroom Management

6e23bcad-c95a-4931-9465-0ce60f7fda32.description: The earner is empowered to provide a consistent and standard quality assurance audit within a facility. Through an interactive, hands-on program, the earner has learned the technical skills needed to perform a cleanliness audit as well as the ethical aspects of having this responsibility.
6e23bcad-c95a-4931-9465-0ce60f7fda32.name: ISSA CMI Accredited Auditing Professional, A.A.P.

issuer.summary: issued by The Worldwide Cleaning Industry Association

badge_template_activities.title: The earner must attend the CMI Accredited Auditing Professional course.
Earning certification requires course completion and passing exam with minimum score of 80%

cd1c5fdd-dcc5-4e16-92f3-8e5a53d34ead.description: ARCSI, the residential arm of ISSA, the worldwide cleaning industry association, is dedicated to improving the standard of professionalism in the residential cleaning industry. With ARCSI membership, members position their businesses as the professional, trusted, and experienced resource their customers need. ARCSI provides members with the resources, connections, and tools they need to succeed and be profitable.
cd1c5fdd-dcc5-4e16-92f3-8e5a53d34ead.name: ARCSI Member

issuer.summary: issued by The Worldwide Cleaning Industry Association

badge_template_activities.title: ARCSI, the residential arm of ISSA, the worldwide cleaning industry association, is dedicated to improving the standard of professionalism in the residential cleaning industry. With ARCSI membership, our members illustrate that they are trusted and experienced professionals.

393ac29c-35fa-4eeb-9c0a-86c6576a0b05.description: The earner demonstrates the skills and knowledge necessary for a successful Custodial Supervisor including: customer service, developing leadership qualities in the building services field, designing an effective department, managing supplies, chemicals, and equipment, organizing cleaning assignments for maximum productivity, and building services operation.
393ac29c-35fa-4eeb-9c0a-86c6576a0b05.name: ISSA CMI Certified Custodial Supervisor, C.C.S

issuer.summary: issued by The Worldwide Cleaning Industry Association

badge_template_activities.title: Earning certification requires course completion and passing exam with minimum score of 80%

skills.name: Evaluating Information To Determine Compliance With Standards

4ffc0167-0985-4ed0-bd2e-55fa4661fb35.description: Earning the Professional House Cleaning (PHC) Certification illustrates that you are a professional in the residential cleaning industry. And as a professional, you not only understand “what” to do but “why.” The PHC Certification is a real training solution for house cleaning technicians.
4ffc0167-0985-4ed0-bd2e-55fa4661fb35.name: ARCSI Professional House Cleaning Certification

issuer.summary: issued by The Worldwide Cleaning Industry Association

badge_template_activities.title: The PHC Certification is comprised of seven modules: 1. What is Professional House Cleaning? Role of the Professional House Cleaner in the Home Environment 2. Oops, How Did That Happen? Safety 3. Is Hygiene a Dirty Word? Health 4. What Does Science Have to Do with It? Chemistry and Physics of Cleaning 5. How Do You Clean That? Contents and Surfaces 6. What Do You Do? Procedures, Methods, and Productivity 7. What Do You Use? Tools and Equipment

This course is an online course that is broken up into 7 modules. Each class ends with a “knowledge check” to test your skills and once all classes are complete, you can take the test to earn your Professional House Cleaning Certification.

8012c87e-8e35-44a8-8de8-10944b733634.description: The earner demonstrates the skills and knowledge to provide a mathematical and factual basis for stated custodial staffing levels in relation to customer and management expectations of clean.
8012c87e-8e35-44a8-8de8-10944b733634.name: ISSA CMI Certified Workloading Specialist, C.W.S.

issuer.summary: issued by The Worldwide Cleaning Industry Association

badge_template_activities.title: Earning certification requires course completion.
Passing exam with minimum score of 80%

skills.name: Interpreting The Meaning Of Information For Others
Perform Calcuclations Using The ISSA Cleaning Times And Tasks Standard

f7a20f31-29db-4a68-a87a-349e9fd1bb5b.description: The earner is prepared and ready to provide training and consulting services to cleaning organizations interested in complying with and preparing to be certified to the Cleaning Industry Management Standard (CIMS).
f7a20f31-29db-4a68-a87a-349e9fd1bb5b.name: ISSA CIMS Expert

issuer.summary: issued by The Worldwide Cleaning Industry Association

alignments.name: The Cleaning Industry Management Standard
alignments.description: The Cleaning Industry Management Standard is the first consensus-based management standard that outlines the primary characteristics of a successful, quality cleaning organization.

badge_template_activities.title: Must exam pass with 80%
Detailed and compressive learning of the Cleaning Industry Management Standard Guidebook and online course.

40793a95-eca0-4b36-a905-ddd8ccd5a310.description: The organization follows best practices and benchmarks to run a proper cleaning operation guided by Quality Systems, Service Delivery, Human Resources, Health, Safety, and Environmental stewardship, and Green building (GB).
40793a95-eca0-4b36-a905-ddd8ccd5a310.name: ISSA CIMS GB with Honors

issuer.summary: issued by The Worldwide Cleaning Industry Association

alignments.name: The Cleaning Industry Management Standard
alignments.description: The Cleaning Industry Management Standard is the first consensus-based management standard that outlines the primary characteristics of a successful, quality cleaning organization.

badge_template_activities.title: Onsite assessment of Quality Systems, Service Delivery, Human Resources, Health, Safety, and Environmental stewardship, and Green building (GB) by an Independent third-party CIMS certified assessor.

Fulfill 5 elements of CIMS and 6th GB element with 100% of “shoulds” and 85% of “shalls”. GB meets the requirement for LED Building requirements and offers a powerful marketing tool for sustainable practice. Certification valid for 2 years.

skills.name: The organization follows best practices and benchmarks to run a proper cleaning operation

13c2de91-b7fd-4394-8a69-b1ec4a28bd8a.description: GBAC Trusted Advisors are part of a professional community that can demonstrate a higher level of training and competency with infectious disease prevention programs. Upon successful completion of the program, you'll earn a two-year digital certificate of completion from the Global Biorisk Advisory Council and be included on the list of Trusted Advisors on the GBAC website.
13c2de91-b7fd-4394-8a69-b1ec4a28bd8a.name: GBAC Trusted Advisor

issuer.summary: issued by The Worldwide Cleaning Industry Association

badge_template_activities.title: All professionals who are interested in assisting organizations to build health, wellness, and resilience in infectious disease prevention. This includes facility consultants, sustainability experts, building service contractors, distributors, and manufacturing sales professionals.

cfc6f74e-cf74-44a3-b652-fb124364311c.description: GBAC is now offering manufacturers and other companies the opportunity to have their programs or technologies related to infectious disease prevention achieve the GBAC STAR™ Registered Seal. The successful registration provides assurance to customers and manufacturers/companies, that the program or technology has been assessed by the GBAC Advisory Council Scientific Board for scientific validity, usability, practicality, safety, and efficacy.
cfc6f74e-cf74-44a3-b652-fb124364311c.name: GBAC STAR Registered

issuer.summary: issued by The Worldwide Cleaning Industry Association

badge_template_activities.title: The GBAC Advisory Council Scientific Board will assess: scientific validity and efficacy, safety and compliance with existing and applicable standards and guidelines, usability, practicality, implementation, and training, environmental compatibility and sustainability, marketing language and claims.
